#This page describes abilities and what they do

= Introduction =

All classes either currently have or will have abilities that they gain at some levels they reach. Almost all abilities have components required to cast them and they can be checked like this.
{{{
/spellcomp Fireball
}}}


= Abilities =

== Warrior ==

=== Deathblow ===
|| Components ||
|| 2 Iron ||
Required Level: 12
Deathblow is a passive ability. When enabled deathblow increases the critical chance of the quester on warrior attacks. It increases from 5 % to 10 %.

=== Dodge ===
|| Components ||
|| 5 Feathers ||
Required Level: 1
Dodge is a passive ability. When enabled there is a chance that any attack may be dodged. When an attack is dodged the quester moves the side one block and takes no damage. The chance for dodging is 1 % + .25 % per level of the Warrior.

=== Powerstrike ===
|| Components ||
|| Wooden Sword ||
Required Level: 3
When Powerstrike is activated it does extra damage to the defender. It does an additional 10 damage.

=== Sprint ===
|| Components ||
|| 1 Feather ||
Required Level: 5
When sprint is cast it moves the caster forward one block. When cast successively it gives the illusion of moving very quickly. When sprinting at full speed a quester can move through walls that are only a couple blocks thick.

=== Fire Arrow ===
|| Components ||
|| 1 Coal ||
Required Level: 7
When Fire Arrow is cast it lights the target on fire as well as doing the normal amount of damage from the arrow.

=== Hail of Arrows ===
|| Components ||
|| 10 Arrows ||
Required Level: 5
Lays down a volley of arrows blanketing the area of the target.

=== Repulsion ===
|| Components ||
|| 1 Torch ||
|| 1 Cactus ||
Required Level: 10
When repulsion is cast it moves all entities near the caster out to a distance of 10 from them. It also does 1 point of damage to each of them.

== War Mage ==

=== Fireball ===
|| Components ||
|| 1 Coal ||
Required Level: 0
Firball lights the target on fire by lighting the 2 by 2 block that the target is standing on on fire. It also does 2 damage + 1 per 2 caster levels to the target.

=== Fireball ===
|| Components ||
|| 5 Coal ||
Required Level: 10
Firball lights the target on fire by lighting the 2 by 2 block that the target is standing on on fire. It also does 2 damage + 1 per 2 caster levels to the target. Then has a 90 % chance to jump to a nearby enemy.

=== Drain Life ===
|| Components ||
|| 5 Glowstone Dust ||
Required Level: 8
Drains between 1 and 3 + Caster Level hit points from target and gives points to caster.

=== Fire Resistance ===
Required Level: 10
Completely passive, gaining this ability makes you take half as much damage from fire as other questers.

=== IceSphere ===
|| Components ||
|| 5 Snow balls ||
Required Level: 7
Freezes the target doing 3 + 1 per 2 caster levels damage to the target.

=== Trap ===
|| Components ||
|| 6 Dirt ||
|| 1 Wooden Spade ||
Required Level: 2
Removes the ground beneath the target dropping them into a hole.

=== Wall of Fire ===
|| Components ||
|| 7 Dirt ||
|| 3 Coal ||
Required Level: 5
Creates a wall of fire in front of the caster 7 blocks wide.

== Peace Mage ==

=== Heal/Heal Other ===
|| Components ||
|| 1 Bucket of Water ||
Required Level: 0
Heals the target, either self or other, by 1-8 + Caster Level hit points.

=== Cure Poison/Cure Poison Other ===
|| Components ||
|| 1 Brown Mushroom ||
Required Level: 5
Cures the target, either self or other, of any poison that it may have received.

=== Trape ===
Same as Trap but separate for experience reasons.

=== Wall of Water ===
|| Components ||
|| 7 Dirt ||
|| 2 Buckets of Water ||
Required Level: 3
Creates a wall of water in front of the caster 7 blocks wide for 60 seconds. 

=== Damage Aura ===
|| Components ||
|| Flint and Steel ||
Required Level: 7
Damages enemies in a radius of 15 around the caster by 1 point every 10 seconds, for 5 minutes.

=== Heal Aura ===
|| Components ||
|| 2 Bread ||
Required Level: 8
Heals questers in a radius of 15 around the caster by the Caster Level / 4 hit points every 10 seconds, for 2.5 minutes.
